The base of other 2D nodes.

  rotation*: float
  scale*: Vector2Ref

Procs

proc Node2D(name: string = "Node2D"): Node2DRef {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Creates a new Node2D.

Arguments:

  • name is a node name.

Examples:

var node = Node2D("Node2D")
